title: Flight delayed? Blame a spaceship.
description:
In Florida, a surging number of space launches has created a new type of travel headache. Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains. 
Read Rebecca’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/23071531/flight-delay-rocket-launch-florida
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions) and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
